model

Class Cinema

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Cinema

  • public class Cinema
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Cinema in a Cineplex. A cinema contains seats and have a defined schedule of screenings.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wong Jing Lun

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CinemaClassType cinemaClassType
      The class of this cinema (e.g Platinum).
      private int cinemaID
      The cinema ID corresponding to this cinema.
      private char[][] seatLayout
      Seat layout of this cinema.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cinema(int cinemaID, CinemaClassType cinemaClassType, char[][] seatLayout)
      Creates a new Cinema with its given ID, classType and seat layout.

    • Field Detail

      • cinemaClassType

        private CinemaClassType cinemaClassType
        The class of this cinema (e.g Platinum).

      • cinemaID

        private int cinemaID
        The cinema ID corresponding to this cinema.

      • seatLayout

        private char[][] seatLayout
        Seat layout of this cinema. Entries are 1 for a seat and 0 for a space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cinema

        public Cinema(int cinemaID,
              CinemaClassType cinemaClassType,
              char[][] seatLayout)
        Creates a new Cinema with its given ID, classType and seat layout.
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - Cinema ID corresponding to this cinema.
        cinemaClassType - Class of this cinema.
        seatLayout - Seat Layout of the cinema.
